name: GrowthBook
description: MCP Server for interacting with GrowthBook - an open source feature flagging and experimentation platform

tools.name: get_environments
tools.description: List all environments (e.g., production, staging) configured in GrowthBook.

tools.name: get_projects
tools.description: List all projects in your GrowthBook instance.

tools.name: get_sdk_connections
tools.description: List SDK connections (how GrowthBook connects to your apps).

tools.name: create_sdk_connection
tools.description: Create a new SDK connection for your app, specifying language and environment.

tools.name: create_feature_flag
tools.description: Create, add, or wrap an element with a feature flag. Accepts key, type, default value, and other metadata.

tools.name: create_force_rule
tools.description: Create a feature flag with a targeting condition (e.g., `country = CA`).

tools.name: get_feature_flags
tools.description: List feature flags in your GrowthBook instance.

tools.name: get_single_feature_flag
tools.description: Fetch details for a specific feature flag by ID.

tools.name: get_stale_safe_rollouts
tools.description: List safe rollout rules that have been rolled back or released. This tools is helpful for removing stale flags from your codebase.

tools.name: generate_flag_types
tools.description: Generate TypeScript types for feature flags.

tools.name: get_experiments
tools.description: List experiments in GrowthBook.

tools.name: get_experiment
tools.description: Fetch details for a specific experiment by ID.

tools.name: get_attributes
tools.description: List user attributes tracked in GrowthBook (useful for targeting).

tools.name: create_experiment
tools.description: Creates a feature-flag linked experiment. Note that this tool calls `get_defaults`, which provides a sampling of previous experiments to help the AI agent create the experiment correctly. For better performance, these defaults are saved to the local file system and periodically updated.

tools.name: get_metrics
tools.description: List fact and legacy metrics (useful for better understanding experiments).

tools.name: get_metric
tools.description: Fetch a specific fact or legacy metric by ID.

tools.name: get_defaults
tools.description: Get default values for experiments including hypothesis, description, datasource, and assignment query. (Runs automatically when the create experiment tool is called.)

tools.name: set_user_defaults
tools.description: Set custom default values for experiments that will be used when creating new experiments.

tools.name: clear_user_defaults
tools.description: Clear user-defined defaults and revert to automatic defaults.

tools.name: search_growthbook_docs
tools.description: Search the GrowthBook documentation for information on how to use a feature, by keyword or question.

GB_API_KEY.title: GrowthBook API key or PAT
GB_API_KEY.description: A GrowthBook API key or PAT. When using a PAT, you can only access tools that your permissions allow.

GB_EMAIL.title: GrowthBook email
GB_EMAIL.description: Your email address used with GrowthBook. Used when creating feature flags and experiments.
